Package net.sf.taverna.cagrid.servicewrapper

caGrid service wrapping of the public InterProScan service provided by EBI

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CaGridInterProScanInput InterProScan input parameters in caGrid format according to UML model.
CaGridInterProScanOutput InterProScan input parameters in caGrid format according to UML model.
InterProScanDataConverter Convert data between caGrid-style UML-backed data and the actual data format used by the InterProScan service.
InterProScanService Placeholder for actual interface of InterProScan service which can be generated using axis/CXF or using internal classes of Taverna such as the wsdl-generic module.
 

Class Summary
InterProScanInput InterProScan input parameters in actual service's format.
InterProScanOutput InterProScan output parameters.
InterProScanServiceInvoker Invoke the actual InterProScan service using its data formats.
WrappedInterProScanService Actual caGrid service to be exposed using gRavi or similar.
 

Package net.sf.taverna.cagrid.servicewrapper Description

caGrid service wrapping of the public InterProScan service provided by EBI

The public caGrid service is represented by WrappedInterProScanService.

The inputs and output of the caGrid service are to be defined by the UML models to be provided separately as part of the caGrid-Taverna integration project. The CaGridInterProScanInput and CaGridInterProScanOutput beans are placeholders for the actual beans to be autogenerated from the XMI files.

Internally the WrappedInterProScanService will use the InterProScanDataConverter to convert the input data to the format expected by the actual WSDL service (placeholder InterProScanInput), use InterProScanServiceInvoker to invoke the service, and convert the output data (placeholder InterProScanOutput) using the converter and returning it to the caller of the caGrid service.
